Key Match Events: Noor Ahmad c Sharma b Arshdeep Singh 12 (18b 1x4 1x6 19m) SR: 66.66
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan's bowlers will ask questions, and India's batters must answer them
Rashid Khan and Fazalhaq Farooqi could be Afghanistan's trump cards, India could counter them with Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have not faced Rashid a lot in T20Is, but in two games, they have scored 69 runs in eight overs without losing a single wicket to him
Rohit and Kohli are tied on 4042 T20I runs, with only Babar Azam (4145) ahead of them
Others: Bridgetown has offered decent batting conditions, having hosted one of the three 200-plus scores seen in this tournament
